plot: An old man who, because of disappointment, escapes from his successful past in order to be alone in the countryside, where he once again have a wonderful time that's soon to be over when he learns that he has Alzheimer's.
title: Clouds of Memories
plot_es: An old man who, because of disappointment, escapes from his successful past in order to be alone in the countryside, where he once again have a wonderful time that's soon to be over when he learns that he has Alzheimer's.
plot_en: An old man who, because of disappointment, escapes from his successful past in order to be alone in the countryside, where he once again have a wonderful time that's soon to be over when he learns that he has Alzheimer's.
